/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades painted in shades of gray and brown, reflecting the urban architecture of the city. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a hazy sky, a common sight in bustling cityscapes. On the right side of the street, a blue fence stands out, adding a splash of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the setting sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. Despite the absence of people in the frame, the image conveys a sense of life and activity, characteristic of a vibrant city like Beijing.
